name: Supernova (itch) (Sintel)
description:
The sun has exploded!
Get on the cosmic highway and try to survive as long as possible. 

Controls: 
left/right - steer 
down/X - brake 
Z - jump 

TIPS:
Exectute a long jump to get a nice boost. 
Steering might seem hard but it gets easier the faster you go, so don't try to take it slow!

Ship design/art by Loni.

Music by Azur.

Made with TIC-80.
